statements: SELECT * FROM GenomicData;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM GenomicData WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_name FROM GenomicData WHERE sequence_name LIKE '%gene%';
SELECT * FROM GenomicData ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT sequence_name, annotation FROM GenomicData WHERE sequence_name = 'DNA sequence';
SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_name, annotation FROM GenomicData ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GenomicData WHERE sequence_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_data FROM GenomicData WHERE sequence_name LIKE 'gene%';
SELECT sequence_id, annotation FROM GenomicData WHERE sequence_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM GenomeData;
SELECT gene_name, start_position, end_position FROM AnnotationData;
SELECT id, sequence FROM GenomeData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AnnotationData WHERE gene_name = 'gene1';
SELECT gene_name, end_position FROM AnnotationData ORDER BY end_position DESC;
SELECT id, sequence FROM GenomeData
SELECT gene_name, start_position, end_position FROM AnnotationData
SELECT * FROM GenomeData WHERE id = 1
SELECT gene_name FROM AnnotationData WHERE start_position < 100 AND end_position > 50
SELECT id, sequence FROM GenomeData ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM GenomicSequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM GenomicSequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT annotation, created_at FROM Annotations WHERE sequence_id = 3;
SELECT annotation_id, annotation, metadata FROM Annotations JOIN AnnotationsMetadata ON Annotations.annotation_id = AnnotationsMetadata.annotation_id;
SELECT * FROM AnnotationsMetadata WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM GenomicSequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM GenomicSequences WHERE sequence ILIKE '%ATG%';
SELECT annotation, metadata FROM Annotations INNER JOIN AnnotationsMetadata ON Annotations.annotation_id = AnnotationsMetadata.annotation_id WHERE Annotations.created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(sequence_id) AS avg_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sequences FROM GenomicSequences;
SELECT * FROM AnnotationsMetadata ORDER BY metadata_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM genomic_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence FROM genomic_sequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT annotation_text FROM annotations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT users.username, access_logs.access_time FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id;
SELECT * FROM genomic_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT sequence FROM genomic_sequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM annotations WHERE annotation_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT annotations.annotation_text, users.username FROM annotations JOIN users ON annotations.sequence_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM sequences;
SELECT id, sequence, length FROM sequences WHERE length > 10;
SELECT annotation, start_position, end_position FROM annotations ORDER BY start_position DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT sequence_id, created_at FROM metadata WHERE sequence_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM sequences WHERE length > 100;
SELECT id, sequence FROM sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT annotation, start_position, end_position FROM annotations WHERE start_position < 50 AND end_position > 100;
SELECT username, password, level FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.id = permissions.user_id WHERE level >= 3;
SELECT sequences.sequence, metadata.created_at FROM sequences JOIN metadata ON sequences.id = metadata.sequence_id WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM metadata.created_at) > 2020;
